text: The best pins in Hollywood : Revenge star Ashley Madekwe shows off never - ending legs in cut - off hotpants at lunch with Cara Santana Revenge star Ashley Madekwe has been flashing her pins in Los Angeles, wearing a pair of denim cut - off shorts on sun - soaked Monday morning. The 32 - year - old strolled confidently along the street, oozing sophistication and style, matching her light denim shorts with a lace cream shirt and trendy round sunglasses. It looks like it was a girly catch - up for Ashley who was meeting up with Hollywood friend Cara Santana, 28, who is the fianc√©e of former Desperate Housewives star Jesse Metcalfe.
